title: Who has written the most songs for other artists? - Quora

response.answer_text: Diane Warren. The most prolific songwriter of our time. She has written around roughly 720 songs for other artists. She is worth around $60 Million dollars. And she owns ALL her own publishing. The number of artists she has written for is too long to list. But a few are Cher, Aerosmith, Whitney Houston, Aretha Franklin, Lady Gaga, Tina Turner, Beyoncé, Roy Orbison, and many, many more. She has written 9 Number One hits. And 32 Top Ten Hits!
